answers.answer: Are you at the point where you have numbness or loss of feeling in your fingers or toes?  If not it is ok to get your nails done.  Yes you have to watch for infection and keep a close eye on it.  If you have feeling though this helps.  I am not a doctor but have been diagnosed with TYPE II Diabetes and doc told me just to keep an eye out.
Hello!I'm a type 1 diabetic and i've had my nails done so, so, sooooo many times and have NEVER had any problems!!!! :)

question: I was resentlt told I was diabetic and they said I had to take real good care of my fingers and toes because of infections, you think it would be okay to go get my nails done!
title: can diabetics get there nails done?
